Package uo.ri.cws.application.business.invoice

Interface InvoicingService

All Known Implementing Classes:
InvoicingServiceImpl
public interface InvoicingService
This service is intended to be used by the Cashier It follows the ISP principle (@see SOLID principles from RC Martin)

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    InvoiceDto createInvoiceFor​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> workOrderIds)
    Create a new invoice billing the workorders in the argument The new invoice will be in NOT_YET_PAID status, the workorders will be marked as INVOICED
    java.util.Optional<InvoiceDto> findInvoice​(java.lang.Long number)  
    java.util.List<PaymentMeanDto> findPayMeansByClientDni​(java.lang.String dni)  
    java.util.List<InvoicingWorkOrderDto> findWorkOrdersByClientDni​(java.lang.String dni)  
    void settleInvoice​(java.lang.String invoiceId, java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,​java.lang.Double> charges)  

  • Method Details

    • createInvoiceFor

      InvoiceDto createInvoiceFor​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> workOrderIds) throws BusinessException
      Create a new invoice billing the workorders in the argument The new invoice will be in NOT_YET_PAID status, the workorders will be marked as INVOICED
      Parameters:
      the - list of workorder ids to bill
      Throws:
      BusinessException - if - the status of any of the workorders is not FINISHED - any of the workorders does not exist - status Is already settled

    • findWorkOrdersByClientDni

      Throws:
      BusinessException

      BusinessException

      Throws:
      BusinessException

      BusinessException
